Message:
I wonder how much time
has passed since then...

But with the way I am now,
there’s nowhere for me to go.

I somehow make it to
the river to quench my thirst.

But...then I see
my reflection in the water—
my big horn and sharp claws.
I don’t want to see them!

With tears streaming
down my face,
I claw at my reflection
in the water.

not only could my claws not
feel how cold the water was,

no matter how roughly
I treated them, they didn’t
even get a scratch on them.

I thrash them
against a boulder,
but only the boulder breaks.

Right now, I’m sure even
a ferocious wolf would take
one look at me and run...
